about_the_game:
The Making of the Multi-Medium is the official art book for The Multi-Medium, curated and written by creator Micah Boursier.

The book (provided as a PDF) features over 100 pages of exclusive scans from the notes, sketchbooks and artwork that went into the making of the game, accompanied by in-depth descriptions and commentary from the creator. In addition to never-before-seen artwork, it features notes on the process of game development as a whole, including the process behind the interface, mechanics, and level design.

Follow along with the developer's journey from start to finish, with all the challenges and setbacks they faced along the way.

The content will be downloaded into the game's local folder. (right click on the game in your library > browse local files).
